title: New and enhanced protections for bank customers
summary: Starting June 30, Canadians will benefit from new and enhanced protections in their dealings with banks. The protections fulfil commitments made by the federal government in 2018 to introduce a new Financial Consumer Protection Framework (Framework) in the Bank Act.

title: FCAC launches Financial Literacy Month 2021
